item.title: Requirements
item.description: Installation # Install the Deno CLI. This is for mac. Other installation methods can be found here. curl -fsSL https://deno.land/install.sh | sh Ensure deno is available in the environment path deno --version Set up your environment # Install vscode deno extension. Open the VS Code command palette with Ctrl+Shift+P, and run the Deno: Initialize Workspace Configuration command.

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Create webapp directory # This will be the working directory of your web application. mkdir webapp && cd webapp Open vscode editor from the working directory code . Create entry point file # Create main.ts file. This will be the entry point of Deno CLI. import application from "https://deno.land/x/fastro@v0.54.0/server/mod.ts"; const app = application(); app.get("/", () => "Hello world"); await app.
